Name: Powder and Sleet
OverviewDesc: Greatly reduces the character's <color=#037a75>Movement Speed</color> upon taking a hit. The effect clears upon <color=#037a75>swapping characters</color>.

Name: Mountain Cleaver
OverviewDesc: Enemies gain the <color=#037a75>Barrier</color> effect, receiving Shield periodically. Destroying their Shield will remove the Barrier effect and reduce the enemies' <color=#037a75>Resistance by 30%</color>.

Name: Featherless Fugitive
OverviewDesc: Enemies gain <color=#037a75>Berserk</color>, becoming more aggressive and approaching the character with Flash periodically. <color=#037a75>The Berserk status is removed for 10s</color> when the character enters Matrix.

Name: Free as a Reaper
OverviewDesc: A <color=#037a75>mother-type enemy</color> on the field will summon 1 <color=#037a75>minion-type enemy</color> every <color=#037a75>6s</color>, up to 3 minions. Each minion on the field grans the mother-type enemy 1 stack of <color=#037a75>Recovery</color>.

Name: Surmountable
OverviewDesc: Overclocking Energy Core now only requires 2 stacks of charges, each stack <color=#037a75>increasing the character's ATK by 10%</color> instead. Entering the Matrix in Enhanced Mode will trigger a Dark Explosion centered around the player, dealing <color=#037a75>200000 True DMG</color> to targets within range.

Name: Twisted Thunder
OverviewDesc: <color=#037a75>Summons lightning at the player character</color> <color=#037a75>every 10s</color>, dealing DMG to the player character.

Name: Falling Gems
OverviewDesc: <color=#037a75>Summons meteors at the player character</color> <color=#037a75>every 7s</color>, dealing DMG to the player character.

Name: Flooded Flame
OverviewDesc: If there are more Constructs than Corrupted on the field when the battle begins, all enemies gain the Commander effect. If there are more Corrupted than Constructs on the field when the battle begins, all enemies gain the Berserk effect.

Name: Frenzied Hunt
OverviewDesc: One enemy on the field will be parasitized, producing a Corrupted after 25s. Another enemy on the field will be parasitized afterward.

Name: Milk and Honey
OverviewDesc: Different Spires will provide different Buffs.
